content: Great app! It has all the setting you could want. It's the 48kHz sample rate and different file formats that sold me, I wanted WAV files and this has it.

No updates since Nov. And I thought I have been recording all my guitar playings.. all along nothing! I've been recording but it doesn't save the sounds! What a waste!!! I usually back up my tunes but there is no way?? I'm only showing 30 tunes.. in which we're last months recordings! None after that! Never again.. and I paid for this app.. smh..

DO NOT PURCHASE. Horrible. I bought the app and every time I try to record it won't open the recording after completion, saying it's unable to be opened. I went to the help bar and followed all the instructions to fix the problem and yet all my recordings are now unable to be opened. THIS IS A COMPLETE WASTE OF MONEY AND TIME. Go elsewhere.
This about covers it.
The only sure way I was able to find to record memos with Bluetooth on Android while I walked. Does what it says it will do, well.

Haven't used it all that much, but it seems to work pretty good
Easy to use. Great quality
Recorded one thing and it won't play

Ok but missing good features The app doesn't have Sort By Newest , so you will end up scrolling endlessly to find your clips. It has no editing tools to trim or record audio over your takes, or resume recording in the same clip. I cant sroll through any waveform, so you cant find specific points in your audio. Once these are implemented, it will be on par if not better than default Mobile recorders.
replyContent: Hi, Thank you for your review and suggestions. Anyway, you can enable sorting by date in app settings (sorting options) and audio editing is available from recording details menu (three dots next to recording name).

content: Distortion when using a lapel mic this does not happen
Good for the Good
It makes weird noise when I'm recording my church service. Not please and I want my refund amount back!
replyContent: Hi, You can try to use AAC format with higher bit rate for better audio quality. Anyway, if you wish a money refund, please contact us at support@smartmobitools.com with your Play purchase ID (starts with GPA.xxxx) to allow us proceed a refund. We would like to help.

content: Great App

A top notch audio recording app üëç Really pleased with the features on Voice Recorder Pro. Particularly enjoy tha ability to tag recordings an arrange them by category (e.g. band stuff, guitar etc). Also like the clear recording interface - a very polished experience.
Come on... Can't even add to existing recordings!? That makes this completely useless
Excellent App. I love it !
Amazing quality of audio.. üå∏
Couldn't upload any of my trial ones to drive only after paying
Terrible App, trimming doesn't work at all!! That is the only reason I bought Pro was so that I can trim videos, I'd like my money back
Great!
Flawless operation. Well done!
This is the best app ever. I love it.

I've bought the pro and now it's not recording, it's stated it is! But I get a fast long sight noise? I have changed the settings a few times but now I think I'll uninstall it.Yes I'm deleting it. And yes I'll have a refund too. Still waiting refund guys, if you have where did you send it?
replyContent: Hello, sorry about the issue. Please just contact us at support@smartmobitools.com and send your Google Play purchase ID to allow me proceed a refund. We would like to help.

content: Works great for notes
Awesome app. Great features. Great work developers. Keep it up.
I am in the early stages of using this app. So far so good. Martin
Does what it says and the sound quality is usable. I am a sound engineer and I would use this professionally in the field, like a photographer uses a point and shoot or cell phone.
Good so far
The best!

For a paid app So broken.. i cannot delete bookmarks. Also bookmarks dont register untill you have entered the name. If i lock my phone while listening to a recording, when i open it up again the app is unusable. I need a tool to re order my catagories. Why is there no wave form visual? This is highly unhelpfull. I really like this app but it needs better functionality. I am using a pocophone f1.
Gesture control is present but it doesn't start recording until phone is unlocked...why? Already Purchased app

It's a reasonable recorder with good choices in terms of file types and quality. Where it falls down is the lack of a waveform on recorded files, it display one while its recording but that's it! The other issue is that scheduled recordings doesn't work. I've attempted this several times on multiple devices but nothing happens, it's broken!
It works great, apart from that I can't delete recordings. It just tells me an error occurred. This might clutter the recording screen pretty quickly with no way to clean it up.
Good App works fine on my Samsung Galaxy Note 10+ 5G.
Love it. Being able to schedule a recording is great. Great quality.
Great
üòä
This app is pretty good but it has a serious error, it doesn't let you name your tracks, it gives an error and says "name already exists" no matter what you name it
Really handy tool

I purchased the Pro version which worked fine for about two days, but it no longer works. When I press the record button, nothing happens. I tried rebooting several times, as well as uninstalling and reinstalling the app, but with the same results. A few times, a momentary message appeared each time I pressed the record button, stating that a fatal error occurred. I have uninstalled the app; very disappointing.
replyContent: To assist with this issue, it would be helpful to have a little bit more information. Can you send any screenshots related to the issue along with your device details at support@smartmobitools.com? Thanks.

content: Ok as a voice recorder. Couldn't record my phone call which is why I brought the app
replyContent: Hi, Thank you for your kind feedback. Unfortunately call recording is not supported by our app. If there is any confusion, can you please write to us at support@smartmobitools.com so that we can improve it. Thanks.

content: I paid for this app and they still wanted access to all my files. Refund please! Steal from me later. I will give you access to all my personal information when you give me access to yours.
replyContent: Hi, App requires storage permission to create new files (recordings) on your device public storage (same location as your personal files but in different folder). We will never access or use your personal informations.

content: Nice App
Best recording app I have ever used, it is well worth the money.

The app works as expected I guess. What's a bit disappointing is you need to choose between bluetooth or not. Why not have an option to autodetect? I sometimes answer calls with bt and sometimes not. Manually needing to switch in the app seems really dumb to be honest. I hope the devs look into that.

Where do I start. For the price, this is probably the definitive voice recorder on the Play Store. It records very high fidelity, with tons of options if you want to get really nitty gritty with your recordings. And the files are efficient. At the max settings possible for my device, a 50 minute lecture only came out to be 500 MegaBytes, whereas I expected it to be over a gigabyte at least. Very, very impressed and pleased with my purchase. I actively am recommending this app to others.

I'm in the process of writing a book and I'm also on the road quite frequently. I'm enjoying the quality of using this app along with high-end headphones. I only wish there was some way to have an entire file transcribed. I opened my computer, turned on voice typing and let the phone handle it but I'm sure there's a better way. Eventual app integration with home automation would be very nice too. To record via my home assistance would make things easier.

This voice recorder is the very best available. It is well thought out and developed. The app has so many really useful features and is very easy to use. The developers are great communicators. So happy I upgraded to the paid version.
replyContent: Thank you so much for your review!

content: Great I just wish it had a waveform while recording because i can never be sure it is actually recording until playback
replyContent: Thank you for your kind feedback. We are aware of this problem and are currently working on solving it.  Please update your app to the latest version when you see an option.

content: Nice recorder but the skip silent feature is not working, which was one reason I selected it.

Excellent! I just downloaded this about half hour ago. Wonderful clarity! I liked it so much, I bought it. üòä Now, is there any way I can upload my recordings to my laptop? Any advice would be really appreciated!
replyContent: Thank you so much for your review! You can upload your recording to your laptop using "Wi-Fi Transfer" feature or just by copying them from "Voice Recorder" folder on your device internal storage.

content: Good

The app loaded in android v9. - the security pin is to access the app, not to secure individual files. This is cumbersome when in a rush to record something. - navigation is confusing. Specially when trying to go to the previous page/screen often resulting in leaving the app altogether. - app stops recording when another app becomes active. In my case I was recording a voice memo, a phone call came in, i took it, and after hanging up my memo was gone. Nice app that needs a little polishing.
replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. We'll pass it along to our development team and see if there is any way we can improve it.

content: I love this recorder I use it for lectures, the only thing I dnt like is that you can not save them to your phone to create a play list and or sign in to other devices once purchased..
Has been used for a couple days everything was fine.Reccommended :) There's nothing y'all to make a review. Good enough to use .
Good for an interview
I bought the pro for ability to sync to Google drive automatically. It's not happening. What is the issue here? I don't see manual sync option.
The best audio app iv ever used

The first time it was very great app Second time i thought this app have some bug ? (I imagining things ?) Third time.....some time or usually app stop recording in important work....I think not to use this app again. Because it makes the job miss the important event Good luck....
replyContent: We apologize for your bad experience. We will check it and improve our app.

content: Easily the Best FREE (no ads/iap) sound recorder available, and a top contender overall. Offers an impressive set of features usually available only in paid and ad-supported apps including noise/echo cancellation, visualizer, and record trimming. That's in addition to essentials like SD card support, sharing, sorting, and selectable frequency/bit-rate. The whole package is neatly assembled in a slick material design interface with great attention to detail by highly skilled developers. WOW!

just updated and now it can save to SD card and not take up soace on internal storage whicj I like ro reserve or the system. Had to drop back to 4 stars as will nor play back properly, thougj it may be a record problem using custom settings
replyContent:
Hello Peter,
We would like to inform you that SD Card support has been just added to our app. Have a wonderful day!

Edit: Thank you for your quick review, looks like the problem concerned newer versions of android,  this should be fixed now.

content: Nice app!
good
Great voice recorder!
App works as intended, and is designed really well. Developers were super quick to respond to previous issues, and earned my 5 stars. Well done!
replyContent:
Hi,
Looks like the problem was in the maps library and it concerned only a few devices. The final update just arrived into play store. Sorry for the inconvenience and thank you very much for your patience. 
In addition, if possible, please contact me via email: jakub.first@gmail.com

content: Google Play won't let me update my last review... But even after the developer let me know he fixed Google Drive sync support, it still doesn't work. But we've gotten further; it now connects to one of my 5 drive accounts, but now it shows a "disconnected" message, and fails to sync. Note: I have multifactor authentication enabled, which doesn't seem to be necessary since I'm already on Android and logged in elsewhere on the device.  Also, the Sorting feature only sorts Alphabetically, but I need sorting by date.  I'm getting a second refund for this app, but this would be the ultimate voice recording app for songwriters if it only added auto sync with Google Drive and showed the last recording in the list (date sorting)
replyContent:
Hi,
Just published new version and Google Drive Sync should work now.
Sorry for any inconvenience caused by this delay

content: Purchased since it stated it could do skip silence, it does not. You can select it, but does not work on Moto g play.
replyContent: Silence skip is available in both versions (free and ad-free). It is possible that your device doesn't support this native feature. Please contact me: jakub.first@gmail.com if you wish to refund your money.
